page.title: 06BRAINTREE GOLF CLUB,STISTED
page.content: {*}Braintree Golf Club is on the edge of Stisted.The course has 18 holes and a par of 70.There are three sections,a ladies,a men's and a junior section.Each week there is a competition and sometimes several. {*}There are about 600 members in the club who play and about 50 social members.The club has a good reputation and has produced many good players. {* }The course is looked after by a team of about 15 men who keep it in excellent condition. {*}My brother,father and I all play golf.My brother,Michael,plays off a handicap of 6 and I have a handicap of 23.
